content: the marci tunisian hat is a free crochet pattern on the blog this tunisian crochet hat features just two stitches - the tunisian knit & purl stitches and combining these two stitches together creates the ribbing for the hat band as well worked from the bottom up worked flat in row and then seamed together at the end hat is easily customizable to size by adjusting the beginning foundation chain two different options are available - make as written with decreases for a more shaped beanie style or just continue row repeats without working decreases to make a slouchy style hat looks great with or without a pom pom approximate finished size for the beanie style 10 wide lying flat x 8 tall teen/adult small beanie i have all the tutorials you need to get started link to purchase ad-free pdf for a small fee https //nanascraftyhome com/product/marci-tunisian-crochet-hat-crochet-pattern-ad-free-pdf/
